properties.Observatio: There are large trees at some places on both sides of the bank. But banks are eroded. Too much water flows in rainy season. In some places, waste have been dumped into streams, and in some places, reserved lands are being misused.

properties.Descriptio: Kirinda Galgediyawa Oya (from the Hodiyadeniya Heenatideniya Kumbura to Kirinda anicut)
properties.Observatio: This 3Km long stream has suffered severe erosion of its bottom and banks to the heavy flow of water during the rainy season. This is the boundary between Kirinda and Galgediyawa GN divisions.
